channel.title: PureCore.ro
channel.description: Static Blog Generator based on npm, marked and jsdom

item.title: Interface implementations with injectable definitions in Go
item.description: Make use of Go's structural typing and support for first-class functions to mock dependencies in unit tests with custom behaviour injectable when needed only for what is needed, without writing an entire mock implementation
item.content:encoded: Make use of Go's structural typing and support for first-class functions to mock dependencies in unit tests with custom behaviour injectable when needed only for what is needed, without writing an entire mock implementation
item.author: padureanvalentin@yahoo.com (Valentin Padurean)
item.media:title: Interface implementations with injectable definitions in Go
